creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
markings: LLC: two red collector seals: [福田文庫] {Fukuda Bunko}, [なでしこその] {Nadeshikosono}; on reverse: unread red collector seal
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
provenance: Fukuda Kyōen 福田敬園; David T. Ford (until 1907); Ruth Lathrop Sikes (until 1967)
title: Actor Ichikawa Yaozō II holding an unsheathed sword
